title: Kim Chol-ho
text:
Kim Chol-ho (; born 15 October 1985) is a retired <a href="North%20Korea">North Korea</a>n <a href="Korea%20DPR%20national%20football%20team">international</a> <a href="soccer">football</a> player. Kim played the <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defensive</a> position. He played for <a href="Pyongyang%20Sports%20Club">Pyongyang Sports Club</a>] between 2005 and 2015.
Kim was born in <a href="Pyongyang">Pyongyang</a>.
